wolf.name: Forest Wolf
wolf.description: A snarling gray wolf with yellow eyes and bared fangs. It looks hungry and aggressive.

attacks.name: bite
attacks.description: The wolf lunges forward with snapping jaws!

attacks.name: claw
attacks.description: The wolf swipes with its sharp claws!

goblin.name: Sneaky Goblin
goblin.description: A small, green-skinned creature with pointed ears and yellowed teeth. It carries a rusty dagger and grins maliciously.

attacks.name: dagger_stab
attacks.description: The goblin thrusts with its rusty dagger!

attacks.name: dirty_trick
attacks.description: The goblin throws dirt in your eyes and attacks!

orc.name: Brutal Orc
orc.description: A large, muscular humanoid with green skin and prominent tusks. It wields a massive club and roars threateningly.

attacks.name: club_smash
attacks.description: The orc swings its massive club down with crushing force!

attacks.name: headbutt
attacks.description: The orc charges forward with a vicious headbutt!
